verse.unicode: ਬਿਨਾ ਭਜਨ ਭਗਵਾਨ ਕੇ ਪਾਪ ਗ੍ਰਿਹਤ ਤਨ ਆਇ ॥੪੩॥

en.bdb: ‘And, being lacking the Godly prayer, the vices over powers him.(43)

ss.gurmukhi: Bgvwn dy Bjn qoN ibnw pwp SrIr nUM gRs lYNdy hn ]43]
